title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, an error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: After pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
EB: The JAR creation process should complete without any error messages.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Select the desired options and settings.
3. Click on the 'Finish' button.
